name: Aes Dana
description:
'''Aes Dana''' is a French [[Celtic metal|Celtic]]/[[black metal]] band, based in [[Paris]], France. The name of the band is [[Old Irish]] for "people of the arts".

The band mixes black metal features like [[Death grunt|growling vocals]] or heavy guitar sound with traditional Celtic instruments like the [[Irish flute]] or [[Bombard (music)|bombard]]. These characteristics, coming from the various influences of the band's early members ([[death metal]], [[black metal]], [[grindcore]], and [[folk music]]), give the band a unique sound.

Their lyrics are primarily in French, and often deal with [[Celtic mythology]].
